2008 in athletics (track and field) - In: Usain Bolt of Jamaica ran the 100 m in 9.72 seconds on May 31 in New York City, NY, USA.
Usain Bolt of Jamaica ran the 100 m in 9.69 seconds on August 16 in Beijing, China.
The Jamaican relay team, consisting of Nesta Carter, Michael Frater, Usain Bolt, and Asafa Powell, completed the 4 x 100 m relay in 37.10 seconds on August 22 in Beijing, China.
Dayron Robles of Cuba ran the 110 m hurdles in 12.87 seconds on June 12 in Ostrava, Czech Republic.
Denis Nizhegorodov of Russia completed the 50 km race walk in 3 hours, 34 minutes, and 14 seconds on May 11 in Cheboksary, Russia.
